title: Math Study Group
detail: Looking for study partners for Algebra 2. Meet at library 3-5pm weekdays. Can help with homework and test prep.

title: School Carpool
detail: Need ride to school from downtown area. Can contribute to gas. Available weekdays 7:30am pickup.

title: Guitar Lessons for Math Help
detail: I can teach guitar basics in exchange for math tutoring. Intermediate guitar player, need help with Geometry.

title: Science Project Partner
detail: Working on chemistry project about household acids and bases. Need partner for experiments and presentation.

title: Weekend Shopping Trip
detail: Going to mall Saturday 2pm. Can drive 3 people. Split gas and parking. Back by 6pm.

title: Spanish Conversation Practice
detail: Native Spanish speaker. Want to practice English. Can help with Spanish homework and conversation.

title: History Essay Help
detail: Writing essay on Civil War. Need help with research and thesis statement. Can meet at coffee shop.

title: Sports Practice Ride
detail: Need ride to soccer practice Tues/Thurs 4pm. Practice ends 6pm. Can pay for gas.

title: Art Skills Exchange
detail: Good at drawing portraits. Want to learn digital art. Can teach traditional drawing techniques.

title: Computer Science Study Group
detail: Learning Python programming. Forming study group for coding projects and homework help.
